com.deltadna.android.sdk.listeners

Class ImageMessageListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.deltadna.android.sdk.listeners.ImageMessageListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EngageListener
    Deprecated. 
    as of version 4.1, replaced by EngageListener

    @Deprecated
public abstract class ImageMessageListener
extends Object
implements EngageListener
    An EngageListener to be used for Image Message requests, which will prepare an ImageMessage for use to be shown by the ImageMessageActivity.

      • show

        protected void show(ImageMessage imageMessage)
        Deprecated. 
        Opens the ImageMessageActivity for showing imageMessage.
        Parameters:

      • onPrepared

        protected abstract void onPrepared(ImageMessage imageMessage)
        Deprecated. 
        Invoked when the imageMessage has been prepared.

        In most implementations show(ImageMessage) should be called, if the application is still in an appropriate state to do so.

        Parameters:
        imageMessage - the prepared image message
